contentList.content: Reduce the next damage taken by the entity by [1], consuming one charge of Unstoppable. Unstoppable creatures cannot be moved by any external forces, neither mundane nor magical.

This creature has [1]. While it has these Temporary Hit Points, it is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GROUNDED">Grounded</LSTag>, any damage lower than 15 will not affect it, and it can use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_DiamondScalesBurst_Bulette">Shredding Scales</LSTag> immediately after being hit for the first time in a round.
